summary: The Advancing Quantum Manufacturing Act of 2025 aims to improve coordination between the Department of Energy and the National Science Foundation regarding the National Quantum Initiative Program. It mandates the establishment of a liaison and outlines the scope of research. The bill also calls for the creation of a Manufacturing USA institute focused on quantum manufacturing, tasked with fostering a robust supply chain and workforce development. Additionally, it directs studies into the progress of the National Quantum Initiative Program and impediments to collaboration.
